# Data Wrangling
## Add Metadata for later filtering

Firstly we have to load the required libraries and import a dataset into a dataframe:
```{metadata load dataset, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, collapse = TRUE}

# load data set
df <- read.csv("https://github.com/retomarek/r/raw/master/datasets/buildingMonitoringTestDataSet.csv",
               stringsAsFactors=FALSE, sep =",")

```

### Date
```{metadata date, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, collapse = TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

df$time <- parse_date_time(data$time, "YmdHMS", tz = "Europe/Zurich")
df$year <- as.Date(cut(data$time, breaks = "year"))
df$month <- as.Date(cut(data$time, breaks = "month"))
df$day <- as.Date(cut(data$time, breaks = "day"))
head(df)
```
